And then there was one....artist, that is
ive been having too much fun with this dream i had a few days ago
dont know if i want to try and make it a book or a D&D game
not sure if my D&D group would enjoy it or be able to take advantage of it
ok - it started off in like a meeting room at what looked like a convention center
i had gotten a ton of my online and offline friends together and had some good news and bad news-
so like a laser tag lobby prep room size maybe?
the bad news was- the planet was doomed- Climate change was going to hit a lot harder and a lot sooner - and we were looking at an extreme drought that would last years
so what was the good news
the good news was- I had a way off the planet and was able to take everyone there with me- but there were some interesting things that needed to be done to make it work
i could create a portal that would take us to Faerun, one of the major D&D worlds
but we couldnt go as ourselves- our bodies wouldnt survive the difference in how the worlds work- so people were like "how do we go then?" and i held up a bunch of blank character sheets
"only way TO go, friends and fellows~"
i was like "you will appear on the other side as the character you have written with all the inventory and abilities mentioned on the sheet"
so i started to hand out sheets when Fluff said "Yeah man- i cant do it- good luck" and left
i was pretty shocked and a bunch of others were like "holy crap-"
for like heroic selfless reasons or just didn't like the terms of the transfer or whatever?
so then people started asking me questions like how do we do stats- what level? what kind of restrictions on items-"
guess he just didnt wanna hang out with us XD
just was like wondering if it was like "I can't leave my people, mannn"
i just remember he was the only one to give up and not go XD
it is a pretty crazy idea
Fluff had to leave for dramatic effect
give up everything you know, to maybe survive
of ALL people to not want to leave the planet

so i was like "it uses 5th ed rules - so for stats you can actually just put 18 in everything because the rules for stats are really open with the exception of 18 is the highest you can possibly roll"
Tom called in for the night?
Have a good one, Tom. Relax awesomely!
he was drawing, then he was like, "no more"
so everyone starts making level 20 characters with 18 in all their stats
people ask about inventory items and im like "No artifacts but make sure whatever you get you can carry"
and people were like "Where will we appear?" and i was like "It should drop us all off in a manor house belonging to my character in Waterdeep"
I started thinking what I could actually carry, not a level 20 character
so everyone finishes and we go through the portal- and im like "sweet- as soon as i open these doors i can go out and see the great world of Faerun!"
and then i hear all this stuff crashing and people yelling
i turn around and a bunch of people didnt put their items in BAGS
so they just appeared with arms full of coins and books and scrolls and rings
done in by the mighty loot
craps going all over the place like dropping a thousand cheese wheels one at a time in skyrim
a bunch of other people are pulling out their EXTRA bags of holding and letting them use those to get their stuff together
i then hear someone scream and what sounds like an implosion -
i run to the nearby room and my friend Ninja Tom is on the ground and is like - "Bryan just imploded! What happened?!"
and I was like "What did he do?!"
and he was like "He was just sorting some inventory when he put a black cloth in his bag-" and i was like "HE PUT A PORTABLE HOLE IN A BAG OF HOLDING?!"
Silver walked over and used True Sight and said "Ah- yep - hes on the astral plane right now trying to pick all his stuff up- should we go get him?"
and Mihari was like "If we did it now he wouldnt learn anything"

so after a while David plane shifted to him and brought him back- then i got everyone together and said no one leaves the house until everyone has a clone! I didnt bring you all from a dying planet just so you could die again! Also. . . Pick a Deity -
"If you dont have a deity you are an atheist and atheists in D&D, a world with a well defined actual pantheon of living and breathing gods, go to Asmodeus and right to hell"
"So if any of you die before your clone is ready you will go to the last level of hell- so pick a god!"
and that was pretty much it for the dream- since then ive been thinking about how a story like that would pan out
had some interesting ideas and concepts
so as a dnd campaign, your character is YOU, but not really you

lol "Pick Sune as your goddess! Orgies every 10 days!" "Really?" ". . . well one of the items i put in my inventory was the Deities and Demigods D&D book- so unless its changed- yes" "Wait- you just took the D&D books with you?!" "I got a tablet!"
"He said the inventory just gives us whatever we wrote down- figured having the D&D lore books would help-"
congrats, now you have access to everything there is to know about this world
lol i was talking about this with a friend and it was like "Wait- what year is it?" "Hmm 1491" "Oh crap- we should go to Nightstone! See What happens!"
"Well that's weird- the nightstone is gone- and theres some adventurers- hey- that's a winged elf- O_O that's Aerie! We're in Sage's Faerun with the characters from Sage's games!"
"We should really stop Elturel from getting dragged into hell then"
had this conversation with a friend specifically- "But how would you stop Elturel from getting pulled into hell?"
"Easy, we just go into the Hells, get the sword from the citadel, go to the Fallen Angel Zariel and - well we need a bard..."
"Zariel- stop being bad!" "No" Bard - "Ive got this- Zariel- stop being bad!" "Kyaah! Whatever you say! Here's my number!" "Holy crap man-" "I know- right?"
"he just said the same thing I did" "but better"
"He flipped his hair while talking to her-"
lots of fun things could be done with all the lore though
"The giants are raging- we need to stop them -if only the king of the storm giants hadnt vanished!" "I actually know where he is-" "What?" *Pulls out book* "Right here-"
I mean, knowing about all the nasty things. Might be suspicious
not sure if youve gotten far enough to know where he is-
you could like - show the book to Blackstaff XD
nah they understand other worlds and planes
though i can see her being blown away by the print quality - the paper - the color- XD
"and it predicts the future-" "I dont care about that- how do you get the writing so crisp?!"
"Excuse me- Lady Blackstaff? We just got word that the city of Elturel has vanished" "I knew we should have taken care of that first-"
"I thought you said we had more time?" "They didnt put exact dates! i went by publishing order!"
*Sigh* "Sorry lady blackstaff- im gonna plane shift into hell for a bit and destroy the companion, brb" "What is brb?"
